name: Catch-A-Pun
description:
Roll your dice to move in a board where each space you land is a Rock Paper Scissors match!

In each level you can build your own dice, changing any of the 6 faces. Then reach the end of the level with your dice and play Rock Paper Scissors with the board everytime you land on a space. Each match is between your dice value (top face) and the space value. Lose 5 matches in a level and you will have to retry!

Game Developed in 48hrs for GMTK Game Jam 2022
Theme: Roll of the Dice
